A little crack jokes at me make me feel discouraged.
I often imagine that if I bury myself through this time, there will be a peaceful world.
Until my periods is over, I wonâ€™t come out from the hole. Itâ€™s the best way for everyone around.
(Sigh) â€œBoys cannot understand girlsâ€ is normal. I canâ€™t even understand myself, either.
